item.title: Another Blast In Kano, 3 Dead
item.description: Reports reaching us say another explosion has rocked Kano today, July 28.  Official statement just released by the Nigeria Police Force and signed by Frank Mba says the bomb went off about 10.00am at Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) Mega Filling Station at Hotoro Quarter along Maiduguri Road, Kano. The attack was launched by the suspected female bomber, who "had slipped into the crowd of citizens buying kerosene at the Station before detonating the explosives.

item.title: DCI yamkamata mjakazi aliyenaswa kwenye video akiwadhulumu watoto wa mwajiri wake
item.description: - Gladys Naliaka Nalianya alikuwa amemtishia mwajiri wake kwamba angefanya kitendo cha ajabu na cha kutamausha baada ya kumfuta kazi - Naliaka anasemekana kuwashambulia watoto wa Mama Maina kwa kuwachapa hadi akawaacha na majeraha mabaya - Mshukiwa amekuwa akitafutwa na maafisa wa polisi kwa siku kadhaaa, walifanikiwa kumkamata akiwa mjini Busia Maafisa kutoka katika idara ya upelelezi DCI wamemkamata mjakazi mmoja ambaye alinaswa kwenye video akiwadhulumu watoto wa mwajiri wake.

item.title: Ty Burrell - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actor known for his role as Phil Dunphy on the ABC comedy series Modern Family. The role has earned him two Emmy Awards and a Screen Actors Guild Award. In 2014, he voiced the role of Mr. Peabody in the feature Mr. Peabody & Sherman and played Jean Pierre Napoleon in Muppets Most Wanted.  Before Fame While attending Southern Oregon University for undergraduate studies, he worked as a bartender at the Oregon Shakespeare Festival. He then went on to earn a Master's degree from Penn State University.

item.title: Yung Berg - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Christian Ward, he is a rapper also known as Iceberg who made it big with "Sexy Lady," his first single, in 2007. Before Fame He signed with DMX's Bloodline Records in 2001. He made his professional music debut with "Dog 4 Life" on the soundtrack for the film Exit Wounds. Trivia He co-wrote and produced Diddy's album, "Last Train to Paris," from 2010. Family Life He is of Puerto Rican descent; his family raised him in Chicago.

item.title: 'Atiku To Declare Presidential Ambition Anytime Soon'
item.description: Ahead of the 2023 presidential election, former Vice President Atiku Abubakar will officially join the presidential race anytime soon, Naija News has learned. In a statement on Friday, Director General of the Amalgamated Atiku Support Groups (AASG), Hon Oladimeji Fabiyi, said Atiku is still consulting with stakeholders and eminent Nigerians. Fabiyi stated that the former PDP presidential candidate is experienced and eminently qualified under the constitution of the country to contest for any office.

item.title: Bill Handel - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Lawyer and radio host of the KFI morning show and Handel on the Law. Before Fame He earned his law degree from Whittier Law School after studying at Cal State Northridge. Trivia He is the founder of the Center for Surrogate Parenting. Family Life He and his wife Marjorie have twin daughters. item.description: Ely Kreimendahl revealed something super personal on Twitter about how she was dumped by a man that she had lovedThe lady's post was super relatable, and before long, it went viral with thousands of reactions and commentsSocial media users flocked to the post to share their own experiences with men and women who kicked them to the curbA Twitter user, @ElyKreimendahl, shared a very personal experience with the world when she posted how her boyfriend dumped her.

item.title: Ekiti State News Today | Daily Updates
item.description: Current governor: Biodun OyebanjiFounded: October 1, 1996Area: 6,353 km²Capital: Ado-EkitiGeopolitical Zone: South WestHDI (2021): 0.614; medium · 13th of 37ISO 3166 code: NG-EKPopulation: 2.3 millionPostal Code: 360001Official WebsiteSlogan: Fountain of KnowledgeEkiti State, NigeriaEkiti State is located in the southwestern region of Nigeria. It was created on October 1, 1996, from the territory of Ondo State. PopulationAccording to the 2006 National population census, Ekiti State had a population of 2,384,212 people.

item.title: Fear Of Bandits? El-Rufai Secretly Withdraws Son From Kaduna School
item.description: Following the increase in bandits’ attacks on public schools in Kaduna, Governor Nasir El-Rufai has secretly withdrawn his son, Abubakar Al-Sadiq from Kaduna Capital School. Naija News recalls that Malam El-Rufai strode like a colossus in the company of his wife, Ummi, into Kaduna Capital School in 2019 and enrolled their six-year-old son in the public school in fulfilment of his campaign promise. Many observers have now described Al-Sadiq’s enrolment as a “political and media stunt” to give the impression that he is like any commoner.

item.title: May 22 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: It may help you in life to find an issue or problem that you feel passionate about. Like Harvey Milk, who was also born on May 22nd, your gift with words and communication could unite others and create change. If you don't feel your gifts are best suited for oration, maybe your gifts would be better used on the page, which was the path of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, author of the Sherlock Holmes novels, who was also born on your birthday.

item.title: TikTok's Spring Cleaning Hacks You Need Right Now for a Sparkling Home
item.description: TikTok Just Made Yet Another Thing Easier for You — Spring CleaningBy Chrissy BobicPublished March 19 2021, 5:01 p.m. ET Source: iStockYou might have already cleaned out your entire home at the start of the 2020 quarantine. But if you haven't and you need some spring cleaning hacks, you know TikTok has you covered. Honestly, is there anything the short-form video app doesn't have the ability to help with in some way?

item.title: Anderson Cooper - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: TV investigative reporter and son of Gloria Vanderbilt. He became famous as the host of Anderson Cooper 360 on CNN. Before Fame Before becoming involved in media he worked as an intern for the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA). Trivia From ages 10 to 13 he modeled for Ralph Lauren. Family Life He is openly gay and has two older brothers named Leopold and Christopher. His brother Carter committed suicide in 1988.

item.title: Brian Lara - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Dominant cricket batsman who was twice named the Leading Cricketer in the World. He set a Test record when he scored a 400 not out in 2004. Before Fame He made his international cricket debut for the West Indies in 1990. Trivia He was inducted into the ICC Cricket Hall of Fame on September 14, 2012. He set a first-class record with an unbeaten 501 in 1994. Family Life He has two daughters, Sydney and Tyla, with model Leasel Rovedas.

item.title: It's Not Easy to Eat When You're a 'Survivor' Contestant Alum Ethan Zohn Reminisces (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Contestants on ‘Survivor’ have almost nothing to eat, so how do they stay alive and well enough to compete in Fiji? Former contestant Ethan Zohn shares some insight. Source: CBSEvery season of Survivor, one of the biggest transformations that the contestants undergo is a serious loss of weight. Some contestants joke about it when they go on the show, ready to lose some pounds, but for all of them, it can look and be very dangerous.

item.title: Louis "Louie" Knight on 'American Idol' Is an Early Standout to Watch
Migori: Goons Corner Jimmy Wanjigi, Pelt His Convoy with Random Stones
item.description: Wanjigi's convoy snaked through the county and made a stopover at Rongo town where a crowd had gatheredThe businessman spoke from the sunroof of his car and addressed a charged crowd that shouted Baba! Baba! The Murang'a tycoon arrived in Kisumu on Thursday, September 19, to arousing welcome by a section of the party supportersBusinessman Jimmy Wanjigi's entourage in Migori county was met with violence when a small pocket of youth began throwing stones at him on Friday, September 17.

item.title: Police spokesperson says he is unaware of VIP vehicle that ran over man in Nyeri
item.description: - Chris Nderitu's family said their son was knocked down by a high end government vehicle which was part of convoy that was heading to President Uhuru Kenyatta's Sagana meeting - The deceased who was on a wheelchair had accompanied one of his relatives to a shopping centre when he met his death - Police spokesperson Charles Owino said his team had launched investigations into the incident to ensure justice is served for the 45-year-old man

item.title: Three Men Drug, Rape Lady They Met On Facebook
item.description: Three suspect have been arraigned before an Ikeja Magistrates’ Court on Friday in Lagos for drugging and defiling a lady they met on Facebook. Naija News understands that the three suspects Jerry Ikechukwu, 28; Bright Umeh, 45, and Patrick Amajuoye, 52 were arraigned on charges of conspiracy, rape, stealing, unlawful possession of stolen items, causing the breach of peace and receiving stolen items. The prosecution Counsel, Inspector Olusegun Oke, told the court that the accused carried out the crime on July 12 at 35, Fadunsi St.

item.title: What FG Discussed With NLC, TUC Over Fuel Subsidy, Nationwide Strike
item.description: The Bola Ahmed Tinubu-led federal government has begged the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) and the Trade Union Congress (TUC) to shelve its planned strike scheduled to start next Wednesday. Naija News reports that the FG appealed during a meeting on Wednesday between government representatives and organized labour. Recall that on May 29, 2023, the President gave Nigerians an inaugural shocking gift by increasing the price of Premium Motor Spirit, PMS, from N185 to N500, which was later jacked up to N617 by the NNPCL.

item.title: 'American Horror Story' Season 10 Wrapped up in the Most Gory, Head-Scratching Way You Could Imagine
item.description: 'American Horror Story: Double Feature' has finally come to an end and the story has been surprising, to say the least. Here's a complete recap. Source: FXSpoiler Alert: This article contains massive spoilers for the season finale of American Horror Story: Double Feature. After what feels like an eternity, American Horror Story: Double Feature has finally come to an end. Everything that went down in the last hour was a real 180 from the rest of the season.

item.title: Spain Defeats England To Clinch First Women's World Cup Trophy
item.description: Spain on Sunday clinched their first Women’s World Cup trophy, after defeating England in the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup. Olga Carmona’s 29-minute strike was the difference in the breathtaking encounter on Sunday. The Spanish women held on to see the game to the end as England tried in vain to crawl back into the game. Reigning two-times Ballon d’Or winner Alexia Putellas was dropped from Spain’s starting line-up for the final against an unchanged England in Sydney.

item.title: UFC Fighter Alistair Overeem Is Retiring, and He Lost Tons of Weight to Prove It
item.description: After years and years as a professional fighter, UFC veteran Alistair Overeem has announced his retirement, and also lost a bunch of weight. Source: Twitter/@Beyond_KickAs a veteran of the world of professional fighting and the UFC, Alistair Overeem has been a fixture in the ring for years and years. Now, Alistair has announced some major changes that have also put an end to his career as a fighter. Alistair, who has been fighting professionally for 25 years, announced the news on the podcast Lovin' Dubai, and also discussed his substantial weight loss.

item.title: "I Write You From A Place Of Hope And Pain
item.description: A friend and associate of Nigerian Instagram celebrity cum International fraudster, Ramon Abbas also known as Hushpuppi, has taken to social media to celebrate the social media sensation on his 40th birthday. Naija News reports that Hushpuppi, turned 40, today,11th October, in prison. Celebrating the embattled internet sensation, his friend Sikiru also known as Pac penned a heartfelt note to him to mark the special day, noting that he was writing from a place of hope and pain in his heart.

item.title: Ali Velshi - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Host of the show Real Money with Ali Velshi on Al Jazeera America, he has previously worked with CNN most notably as a Chief Business Correspondent and anchor for Your Money. Before Fame He started his broadcast journalism career in Toronto as a reporter for a local Toronto station. He would move up to be the host of Canada's first prime time business news hour called The Business News. Trivia He has reported for notable shows such as Anderson Cooper 360, American Morning, and The Situation Room.

item.title: Why I Think The Gay Community Should Come Out by Seun Kuti
item.description: I’m writing to condemn the recent anti-gay bill signed into law by our President Jonathan Goodluck. This law – which contains penalties of up to 14 years in prison for anyone in a same-sex marriage or civil union, 10 years for anyone who attends a same-sex wedding, 10 years for anyone involved with an LGBT organization, and even 10 years for anyone who shows affection for someone of the same sex – should be cast out.

item.title: Missing Chibok Schoolgirls: Local Hunters Identify 9 Hostage Camps
item.description: Abducted Chibok school girls Members of the vigilante group in Borno State have identified about nine Boko Haram camps around Sambisa, where the abducted girls are currently being held hostage. The vigilante members, who are also seasoned hunters and know the terrain confirmed this development on May 20, claiming that their members operating in the neighbourhood of Sambisa, had noticed strange movements in the area that led to the confirmation that the abducted schoolgirls had been split up into tiny groups and shared  among different camps in the Sambisa forest.

item.title: Nene Leakes' Family History Is a Bit Complicated
item.description: NeNe Leakes hasn't spoken much about her dad in recent years or the man who raised her, leading some fans to wonder who her biological father is. Source: InstagramAfter being one of the faces of The Real Housewives of Atlanta for almost its entire lifespan on Bravo, NeNe Leakes will not be returning with the rest of the women for Season 13. It was a personal choice, but for fans, it means losing one of their favorite OG housewives yet again.

item.title: Iheanacho May Feature In Leeds United Vs Leicester City Clash
item.description: Super Eagles star, Kelechi Iheanacho could potentially feature in his debut match since his return from the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) as Leicester City faces Leeds United on Friday (today). Naija News reports that Iheanacho had been absent for approximately a month due to his participation with the Super Eagles at the AFCON 2023 finals. Although the 27-year-old rejoined Leceister last week, he was not included in the matchday squad for the home loss against Middleborough.

item.title: Dick Clark Isnt Hosting Near Years Rockin Eve Anymore, but He Started It
item.description: Dick Clark created 'New Year's Rockin' Eve' in 1972 and his name sticks even though he's not hosting it anymore. Read on for more information. Source: Getty ImagesThe Gist: Dick Clark launched New Year's Rockin' Eve in 1972.After Dick had a stroke in 2004, Ryan Seacrest took over hosting duties in 2005, but Dick still appeared on the show until he passed away in 2012.Keeping Dick Clark's name in the show's title is likely a way to honor Dick's legacy.

item.title: Killing Eve Fiona Shaw bio: top 10 facts about the actress
item.description: We know Fiona Shaw due to her appearance onscreen as Carolyn Martens in “Killing Eve” and Petunia Dursley in a series of films about Harry Potter. However, this Irish actress has an impressive list of other roles on her personal record. What is more, she has a range of secret facts that only few people know about her. If you want to discover them right now and if you want to make clear some controversial rumours about this actress, this is your chance!

item.title: The Kohinoor Diamond's History Plus, Why You Won't See It at King Charles III's Coronation
item.description: The Kohinoor diamond has a controversial history, and that's why you won't see it at King Charles III's coronation. Perhaps he's lucky — it's cursed! Source: Getty ImagesThe history of the Kohinoor diamond dates back as far as the 1500s, and in fact, probably much further back than that. But the Islamic Mughal dynasty in India is the first time a recorded history of the controversial diamond existed, according to Smithsonian Magazine.

item.title: Ako sawa kweli? Picha za Gavana Joho akionekana mnyonge zazua gumzo
item.description: - Joho hujulikana kwa kimo chenye misuli kutokana na kuchapa mazoezi - Hilo halipo kwa sasa na anaonekana mlegevu huku kimo chake kikipungua - Joho amekuwa akiwika kwenye siasa za ukanda wa Pwani na wakati huu ameahidi kuwasilisha kiti kwenye uchaguzi mdogo Msambweni Gavana wa Mombasa Hassan Joho amezua mjadala mtandaoni baada ya kuonekana akiwa mnyonge. Joho ambaye hujulikana kwa umbo lenye misuli kutokana na mazoezi anaoenakana akiwa amelegea kama mwenye matatizo ya kiafya.

item.title: Dele Alli To Return To Everton After Sustaining Injury In Besiktas
item.description: On Saturday, Dele Alli, who is on loan from Everton, will fly back to the UK for an evaluation of an injury he suffered while playing for Besiktas. Dele Alli is unable to play for Everton this season but will be assessed by the club’s medical professionals. At the end of August, Alli made a loan transfer from Everton to Besiktas in the Turkish Super Lig. He has been struggling there, with just two goals and one assist in 15 appearances.

item.title: Who Stole Millions Worth of Jeffree Star Makeup? Inside the Robbery
item.description: Jeffree Star Details Multi-Million Dollar Makeup Robbery in Shane Dawson's DocumentaryBy Gabrielle BernardiniUpdated Jan. 17 2020, 5:43 p.m. ET Source: InstagramIn Shane Dawson’s latest Jeffree Star documentary video, the YouTubers detail a scary robbery that took place earlier this year at one of the beauty mogul’s cosmetic warehouses. In the video titled, “The Dangerous World of Jeffree Star,” the influencer sends Shane a voice memo, telling him that about $1 million worth of product had been stolen.

item.title: Alpha Conde: Guinea President Put Under Arrest as Military Takes Over Gov't
item.description: The military plotted a takeover in Conakry that turned out successful on Sunday, September 5, seeing the detention of President Alpha CondeThe officials accuse Conde of overseeing corruption in government and plunging the country to almost irredeemable levels of poverty However, the act was condemned by the UN secretary-general Antonio Guterres who called for the immediate release of the besieged president Guinea's President Alpha Conde is reported to be detained after the military took over the reins in Conakry.

item.title: Boris Johnson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: English politician from the British Conservative Party who was the UK Prime Minister from 2019-2022. He was previously installed as the Mayor of London in 2008. He was also the editor of The Spectator, a weekly British conservative magazine from 1999 to 2005.  Before Fame He began his career as a journalist and newspaper editor at The Times and then The Daily Telegraph after graduating a King's Scholar from Eton College.

item.title: Mikel Obi Excludes Kanu In His Premier Leagues All-time African XI
item.description: Retired Nigeria international, Mikel Obi, has named his Premier League’s all-time African XI without including his countryman, Nwankwo Kanu. Mikel Obi also omitted Algerian football legend, Riyad Mahrez, from the list. However, the winger was a multiple Premier League champion with Manchester City and also won one league title with Leicester City. Just like Obi, Kanu is one of the most decorated footballers in Africa and was part of the invincible Arsenal squad that won the Premier League title in the 2003-2004 season.

item.title: Okowa Slams Buhari Over Fresh Order On Grazing Reserves
item.description: Governor Ifeanyi Okowa of Delta State has asked President Muhammadu Buhari to shelve the idea of reviving 368 grazing reserves in 25 states of the federation. Okowa said the decision of the Federal Government to go ahead with the plan to revive grazing sites across the country is a deliberate disregard for the governors and people of the Southern region. The governor also berated the President for going ahead with the plan to revive the grazing reserves despite stiff opposition by the people of Southern Nigeria.

item.title: Dad Bullies Daughter into Walking 5 Miles in 36-Degrees After She Bullied a Classmate
item.description: Dad Makes His Daughter Walk 5 Miles to School In 36-Degree Weather for BullyingBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Dec. 6 2018, 3:10 p.m. ET Source: facebookMatt Cox of Swanton, Ohio is currently the talk of the parenting town all over Facebook. He administered a no-nonsense punishment to his daughter, Kirsten, when she was caught bullying a classmate while riding on the school bus. The 10-year-old elementary student was forced off the bus twice in the past for her behavior.

item.title: Jermain Defoe - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: English striker who joined Bournemouth in 2017. He has also played for Tottenham Hotspur, Toronto FC and Sunderland. In 2004, he became a member of the English national team. Before Fame He joined the Charlton Athletic youth system at age 14. Trivia He scored five goals in one game with Tottenham against Wigan Athletic in November 2009. Family Life He grew up in a working-class neighborhood in London. His half-brother, Jade Defoe, was killed in an assault in 2009.

item.title: Kourtney Kardashian - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Oldest sister of Kim and Khloe who gained fame through her family's reality series Keeping Up with the Kardashians, Kourtney and Kim Take Miami, and The Kardashians.  Before Fame She graduated from the University of Arizona with a theatre arts degree and Spanish minor. Trivia She first appeared on TV on the 2005 E! reality series Filthy Rich. Family Life She had children Penelope, Mason and Reign Aston with former partner Scott Disick, whom she had an on-and-off relationship with since 2006.

item.title: The Final Four on The Golden Bachelor Looks a Bit Different
item.description: We've got the scoop on who Gerry Turner picks at the end of 'The Golden Bachelor,' but let's get to know the widower's final four ladies. item.title: Big T - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Battle rapper and member of the battle group NWX who became known as Big T. He has battled with the likes of Hollow Da Don, Tsu Surf and K-Shine. He made "Chalaka-boo" a trademark in part of his battles. Before Fame He became known after he was cosigned by 50 Cent in July 2012. He has called him one of his favorite battle rappers. Trivia He went viral after he faked his own death as part of a publicity stunt in July 2013.

item.title: Distracted With... Gianna Christine (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: NYC influencer and content creator Gianna Christine has a love for live music — and her social feeds prove it! In between her videos showcasing her life living in the Big Apple, Gianna shares up-close clips of some of her favorite artists as they perform live, standing in line for hours for a chance to get the best view. Gianna took the time to answer 13 quick questions with Distractify, sharing the details of her first-ever concert and her go-to bodega order.

item.description: Canadian voiceover artist whose credits include Beast Wars, Dragon Ball Z, Johnny Test and X Men: Evolution. Before Fame He first became fascinated with the idea of voice acting at the age of twelve, when he found out that Paul Frees, the actor whose voice welcomed visitors to Disney's Haunted Mansion, was also the voice of the Pillsbury Doughboy. Trivia Between 1990 and 2007, he provided voices for close to 9,000 western animation, anime, video game, and live action characters.

Amidst dealing with Cold War-era tensions and racial segregation, the superpowered siblings must band together to prevent yet another apocalypse.

item.title: 7 places to visit in Ghana for honeymoon
item.description: Are you planning unforgettable honeymoon? Then look through these places to visit in Ghana. We strongly advise you to choose one of them. Any of these attractions will make your romantic pastime amazing and very classy. Honeymoon is the time when you can slip away from the madness and fuss of this world. Finally, you can seclude with that person who will share your joys and sorrows throughout life in a special place.

item.title: Drama As Another APC Governorship Candidate Emerges In Edo
item.description: Another member of the House of Representatives, Anamero Dekeri, has become the third governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Edo State. Naija News reports that Dekeri, the member representing Etsako Federal Constituency at the House of Representatives, emerged in a parallel primary election of the APC on Saturday, February17. According to Punch, one Ojo Babatunde, who declared Dekeri as the winner of the primary election held on Saturday said he was acting on behalf of all the local government returning officers.

item.title: Seven Community Leaders Killed As Gunmen Attack Imo State (Full List)
item.description: An attack by unknown gunmen on the Mmahu autonomous community in Ohaji/Egbema LGA of Imo state has left seven prominent community leaders dead. Naija News gathered that the leaders including the president-general of the community, Charles Mgaraho were all killed during the attack on Tuesday morning. Six other leaders killed during the invasion were identified as Edeme Okoro, Issac Ojenna, Anene Funky, Chasity Paulinus, Ndubuisi Nwabuishi, and Ifeyirinwoke Junior. An indigene of the community, Elvis Iheanacho who spoke to TheCable on the incident lamented the dangerous trend cases of insecurity has assumed in the area and generally in the country.

item.title: Asuka - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Japanese wrestler known as a multiple-time champion in promotions like Dramatic Dream Team and Smash. In 2015 she joined the WWE's NXT; she began wrestling for Raw in 2017. She has also worked as a graphic designer and writer for XBox Magazine. item.title: Judges, Politicians, Public Office Holders To Get 114% Salary Rise
item.description: The Revenue Mobilisation, Allocation and Fiscal Commission (RMAFC) has announced a 114 per cent increase in the salaries of politicians, judicial and public office holders in Nigeria. The RMAFC chairman, Muhammad Shehu communicated the changes during the presentation of the reviewed remuneration package to the governor of Kebbi, Nasir Idris. The new salaries will be effective from January 1, 2023, said Shehu, represented by Federal Commissioner Rakiya Tanko-Ayuba. Shehu justified the decision based on the provisions in paragraph 32(d) of part 1 of the Third Schedule of the 1999 constitution of the federal government (as amended).

The minister said the government has resolved that the November 6 election will take place, adding that the government is determined to ensure a hitch-free election in Anambra.

item.title: Usman Ododo Sworn In As Kogi State Governor

Naija News learned that Ododo took the oath of office at around 2:24 pm in Lokoja, the state capital, on Saturday. His inauguration came just minutes after Salifu Joel Oyibo took his oath of office as the deputy governor of Kogi State.

Matawalle Officially Dumps PDP, Joins APC
item.description: Zamfara State Governor, Bello Matawalle has officially dumped the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for the All Progressives Congress (APC). The official defection took place in Gusau, the state capital on Tuesday evening at an event attended by some APC governors and chieftains. The Governor appealed to all stakeholders to join hands with him to move the party and state forward. Speaking during the defection ceremony, the Zamfara State Governor, “As from today, I Bello Matawallen Maradun, governor of Zamfara State, am happy to announce my defection from the PDP to the APC.

item.title: Ijaw Leaders Visit President Buhari In Aso Rock
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Thursday hosted the leadership of the Ijaw National Congress (INC) at the Aso Rock Villa in Abuja. The president during the visit, commended the leadership of the Ijaw National Congress (INC) on their recent affirmation of belief in a United Nigeria and supporting the fight against insecurity by developing internal control mechanisms. The National Executive of INC was led by Professor Benjamin Okaba, Naija News reports.

item.title: Jang Tells PDP How To Solve Lingering Crisis

It is believed that the fallout of the PDP presidential primaries and the emergence of Ifeanyi Okowa as the party’s Vice Presidential candidate has caused bad blood between Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State and the party The silence of the Rivers governor following the happenings is also believed to be causing jitters within the PDP leadership.

item.title: Nollywood Veteran, Chico Ejiro Is Dead
item.description: Veteran Nollywood producer, Chico Ejiro is dead. Naija News understands the Nollywood veteran filmmaker died in the early hours of Friday, December 25, 2020. He reportedly died of a seizure just about 24 hours after concluding a new movie of Christmas eve, December 24. His remains has been deposited in the mortuary. The late Chico Ejiro (born Chico Maziakpono) hails from Isoko in Delta State, Nigeria. He studied agriculture before venturing into screenwriting, movie producing, and directing.

item.title: Party Members Dump APC, PDP For NNPP In Gombe State
item.description: More people seem to have been allegedly troping to the New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP), as the party again received new members yesterday in Kaltungo Local Government Area of Gombe State. Naija News reports that the new members were defectors from the All Progressives Congress (APC) and the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the said local government area. According to the governorship candidate of the party in the state, Khamisu Mailantarki, who received them alongside other party chieftains like the state party chairman Maikano Abdullahi, the recent defection into the party was evidence of the NNPP’s successes.

item.title: Adams Oshiomole Fixes Date To Declare Presidential Ambition
item.description: Former Governor of Edo State and National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Comrade Adams Oshiomhole is set to join the 2024 presidential race. Naija News reports that all is now set for the former labour leader to declare his intention to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari in 2023. According to Victor Oshioke, media aide to Adams Oshiomhole, the former governor will declare his intention tomorrow Wednesday. In a statement to newsmen on Tuesday, Oshioke said the APC chairman will make an official declaration at 3pm at the Cyprian Ekwensi Centre for Arts and Culture in Abuja.

item.description: The Minister of Labour and Employment, Senator Chris Ngige has welcomed the court order which directed the striking resident doctors in Nigeria to resume work. item.title: Ayus Camp In Panic Mode After Wike, Atikus Meeting In London

item.title: Parents Are Creating Facebook Groups to Set up Playdates to Give Their Kids Chickenpox

With his intelligence, goofy tendencies, and confidence, he's arguably one of the strongest characters on the show. But what makes him even more lovable is the way that he deals with his cleidocranial dysplasia (CCD).

item.title: Bulkachuwa Asks Court To Stop ICPC From Probing Him For Influencing Wifes Decisions
item.description: A former senator, Adamu Bulkachuwa has turned to the federal high court in Abuja, looking to halt an investigation by the Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission (ICPC) into his actions. On June 10, during the 9th senate valedictory session, Bulkachuwa claimed his wife, Zainab Bulkachuwa, used her influence as a judge to aid his colleagues in the senate. As the former president of the court of appeal and the first woman to hold this position, Zainab’s involvement drew significant attention.

item.title: Court Faults Buhari Over Breach Of Law On Judges Appointment
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has been accused of breaching of section 256(2) of the Nigerian Constitution after sending names of 11 candidates recommended to him by the National Judicial Council for appointment as judges of the High Court of the Federal Capital Territory to the Senate for screening and confirmation. According to Justice Inyang Ekwo of the Abuja Federal High Court on Wednesday, September 23, the president acted in contravention of the law.

item.title: Wigwe, Wife, Sons Corpses Arrive For Burial Service
item.description: The remains of the late former Chief Executive Officer of Access Holdings, Dr Herbert Wigwe, his wife, Doreen, and son Chizzy, have been brought to the RCCG Isiokpo, where the funeral service is to take place. Their remains arrived in separate vehicles and were driven onto the church premises precisely at 11 a.m. It is understood that the funeral service is anticipated to commence at any moment now. Naija News earlier reported that politicians, businessmen, captains of industry, and other dignitaries havearrived at the Redeemed Christian Church of God (RCCG) in Isiokpi, Ikwerre Local Government Area of Rivers State, for Herbert Wigwe’s funeral service.

item.title: Family Reveals When Mohammed Fawehinmi Will Be Buried
item.description: Mohammed, the eldest son of late legal icon and activist, Chief Gani Fawehinmi, will be buried after an autopsy has been conducted and the result released. At a press conference on Thursday, Mohammed’s sister, Mrs Basirat Fawehinmi-Biobaku, who spoke on behalf of the family, made the announcement. According to her, the family could not preempt the cause of his death until release of the autopsy result. Recall that Mohammed was said to have complained of breathing difficulties and was taken to a hospital, where he later died.

item.title: How to check CRB status online in Kenya: guide and options
item.description: A positive CRB rating means that you consistently pay loans and debts on time, while a negative indicates that you may have defaulted paying them. Kenya's lenders can determine if you are a defaulter by accessing the CRB listing record. Being blacklisted affects your credit score and can hinder you from getting loans and other types of credit from lenders. Learn how to check CRB status online in Kenya today.

item.title: Wole Soyinka Speaks On Voting For President Buhari In 2015
item.description: Nobel Laureate winner, Wole Soyinka has on Thursday said that he did not endorse Buhari in 2015. Soyinka stated during a press conference in Lagos that he did not vote on election day in 2015. He explained further that he only asked Nigerians not to vote for Goodluck Jonathan. He said: “It is false to say that I supported the election of Buhari.” Soyinka said that it is his right to vote for anyone he pleases and if the person in question fails to get the job done, he is entitled to say it.

item.title: Four Rescued Alive In Lagos Aircraft Crash
item.description: Four occupants of a helicopter that crashed in front of a United Bank for Africa (UBA) branch in the Ikeja area of Lagos State, have been rescued alive. In a statement on Tuesday, the spokesman of Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos, Gboyega Akosile said the four occupants were retrieved from the aircraft alive. Akosile disclosed that the four casualties have been transferred to the hospital for further care and treatment.

item.title: KCSE 2019: Orodha ya shule 10 bora nchini
item.description: Matokeo ya Mtihani wa Kitaifa wa kidato cha Nne (KCSE) 2019 yalitangazwa na waziri wa Elimi Profesa George magoha katika makao makuu ya mitihani nchini mnamo Jumatano, Desemba 18. Akitangaza matokeo hayo, Magoha alisema mwaka huu matokeo yamekuwa bora kuliko mwaka jana. Habari Nyingine: Mtahiniwa bora wa KCSE 2019 ni mvulana Wanafunzi 627 walipata alama ya A katika mtihani wa KCSE 2019 ikilinganishwa na mwaka jana ambapo ni wanafunzi 315 tu ambao walifanukiwa kupata alama hiyo.

item.title: Married Man Arrests Teenager For Refusing Sexual Advances In Rivers
item.description: A man identified as James has reportedly arrested a 17-year-old girl for refusing his sexual advances after giving her money severally in Rivers State. The man had brought police officers from Kala Police Division to apprehend the girl identified as Faith at Best Man Estate, in Rumuokuta. Speaking on the incident, Faith explained to newsmen that she usually does pedicures for the man, saying the latter usually ask her to keep the change after paying for services rendered.

item.title: Tinubu Govt Bans Binance, OctaFX, Others Over Forex Crisis
item.description: The Federal Government has reportedly banned the major online crypto platforms to avert the continuous manipulation of the forex market and illicit movement of funds. Naija News reports that the latest development comes after the National Security Adviser, Nuhu Ribadu, ordered a crackdown on currency speculators in the country. It was gathered that the Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) communicated the directive to telecommunication companies to block the crypto platforms. Speaking with PremiumTimes, a source within the telcos in the country on Wednesday evening said the directive is being acted upon.

item.title: Why I Asked That My Five Children Be Buried Along My Husband
item.description: Veteran actress, Idowu Philips, popularly known as Iya Rainbow, has opened up on how the fear of her inability to cater for five children after her husband’s death pushed her to ask that they be buried alongside their father. The veteran actress made this known during an interview with BBC Yoruba, where she disclosed that people started to disrespect her and call her ‘Idowu’ due to her husband’s death. She said she suffered to train her five children, adding that nobody hustled more than her.

item.title: Kwankwaso, Running Mate Meet Anglican Primate (Photos)
item.description: Ahead of the 2023 elections, the New Nigeria People’s Party (NNPP) presidential candidate, Rabiu Kwankwaso and his running mate, Bishop Isaac Idahosa, on Wednesday,  paid a visit to the Archbishop of Metropolitan and Primate of the Anglican Communion, Henry Ndukuba. The media aide to the NNPP flagbearer, Saifullahi Hassan, made this known in a statement issued after the meeting. According to the statement, the former Governor of Kano State and ex-Minister of Defence was accompanied by President/CEO, IykeJordan Group Limited, Ikechukwu Nnahasi, Managing Director, Treasure Suites Limited; Godfrey Ejim; and former and serving members of the House of Representatives, including Kawu Sumaila, Alhassan Rurum, Badamasi Ayuba and many others.

item.title: Tiwa and Tee-Billz bar journalists, guests from shooting videos, pics.
item.description: Journalists and pressmen have been barred from the wedding ceremony between Tiwa Savage and her soon-to-be hubby, Tunji ‘Tee-Billz’ Balogun, which started in the morning of November 23, 2013, Saturday. Security officials from Bolt Events security company and soldiers stationed at the Ark Vicinity, Lekki – the venue of the event – have refused to allow journalists with video and photo cameras into the premises despite showing up with their invitation and access cards.

item.title: Magazeti ya Kenya Alhamisi, Novemba 21: Ombi la Gavana Waititu latupiliwa mbali na korti
item.description: The Star Katika gazeti hili Gavana anayezingirwa na utata Ferdinand Waititu kwa mara nyingine tena amezuiliwa kuingia katika ofisi yake. Kupitia kwa wakili wake, gavana huyo aliambia mahakama kuwa kuna masuala ya dharura ambayo anatakiwa kushughulikia kwa haraka na kwa hivyo kuomba kuruhusiwa kuingia ofisini. Waititu pia alidai kwamba naibu wake James Nyoro, anapania kumnyanganya wadhifa wake. Hata hivyo, mahakama hiyo ilisema Waititu anatakiwa kusubiri uamuzi mnamo Desemba 20 kama ilivyoamua awali.

item.title: See The Full List Of Amended Charges FG Brought Against Nnamdi Kanu
item.description: Ahead of Thursday’s court session, the full list of the amended charges filed against Nnamdi Kanu by the federal government of Nigeria has been obtained. Kanu, the leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) is scheduled to appear before Justice Binta Nyako of the Federal High Court in Abuja. The office of the Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice has on behalf of the federal government, filed a seven-count amended charge against the leader of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu.

item.description: - Murkomen alifichua kuhusu mazungumzo aliyokuwa nayo na Rais Uhuru wakati alitemwa nje ya afisi ya Kiongozi wa wengi katika seneti - Seneta huyo alisema kiongozi wa taifa alimwambia alihitaji watu waliokuwa na nia njema ya kuendeleza agenda yake kushikilia nafasi hiyo - Nafasi yake ilichukiliwa rasmi na mwenzake wa Pokot Magharibi Samuel Poghisio - Aidha pia seneta wa Nakuru Susan Kihika alitimuliwa kwenye wadhifa wa kiranja wa wengi wakati wandani wa Ruto walipokuwa wakilengwa

item.title: ASUU Strike: Lecturers Ready To Resume Work
item.description: Renowned human rights lawyer and Senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN), Femi Falana has said that public university lecturers are ready to end the lingering ASUU strike. Naija News reports that the Academic Staff Union of Universities, ASUU due to some disagreement with the federal government, have embarked on an indefinite strike, leaving students to suffer the consequence of returning to their various homes. ASUU leadership had met severally with representatives of the government, yet were unable to resolve their differences.

item.title: Eva Halina Rich - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Model who was named Miss Poland 1985 and went on to model for publications like Vogue, Elle and Cosmopolitan. She has acted on series like The Dream Team and began starring on the reality show Zony Hollywood in 2015. Before Fame She began training for the Polish gymnastics team at age 5. Her dreams of becoming an Olympian ended following a devastating knee injury. Trivia She toured Eastern Europe as a trapeze artist with the Julinek Circus.

item.title: What happened to Lil Kim's daughter's eye? Everything to know
item.description: Lil Kim is one of the world's most influential women in hip-hop. She has a double-platinum album under her belt, among other achievements. The Crush On You singer had a baby in June 2014. Royal Reign Jones Neil was born with a condition called eyelid drop. Many wondered if Lil Kim's daughter's eye condition was a genetic disorder or something else. Lil Kim has been a rapping queen for a long time.

The release day for the Shane Dawson X Jeffree Star "Conspiracy" makeup collection has finally arrived, and fans are flocking to buy anything and everything from it. The YouTubers have been teasing the collection for months now on their joint docuseries The Beautiful World of Jeffree Star.

item.title: Taylor Schilling - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Award-winning actress best known for playing Piper Chapman in the Netflix series Orange Is the New Black. She also played Beth Green in the romantic film The Lucky One and starred in Atlas Shrugged: Part I as businesswoman Dagny Taggart. Before Fame She was chosen to play Nurse Veronica Callahan in the drama Mercy.  Trivia She starred in the 2019 films The Prodigy and The Public. Family Life She grew up splitting her time between her mother and father, who had gotten a divorce.

item.title: Akpabio To Announce Selected Senate Committee Members This Week
item.description: As the jostle for juicy committees gets hotter in the National Assembly, the President of the Senate, Godswill Akpabio, is set to announce some select committees of the Senate this week. Naija News gathered that the selection of the chairmanship of some committees was the reason why Akpabio met with President Bola Tinubu on Thursday. Informed sources told The Punch that leadership and members of a few committees would be announced this week by the Senate President.

item.title: Are Apollo Nida and Phaedra Parks From RHOA Friends?
item.description: Phaedra Parks Revealed Where She and Apollo Nida Stand Now After ‘RHOA’ By Elizabeth RandolphPublished July 5 2022, 8:38 p.m. ET Source: Instagram/@phaedraparks, Instagram/apollonida03When The Real Housewives of Atlanta fans first met Phaedra Parks, the esteemed attorney was pregnant with her first son — Ayden. Phaedra became pregnant shortly before marrying her longtime love, Apollo Nida. At the time, Apollo had recently been released from prison and was ready to settle down with Phaedra.

item.title: Buhari Doesn't Want To Finish As A Loser
item.description: The Special Adviser to President Muhammadu Buhari on Media and Publicity, Femi Adesina has given more explanation on the decision of the President to terminate the appointment of two Ministers. It will be recalled that President Buhari in an unexpected move on Wednesday, terminated the appointments of the Minister of Agriculture, Mohammed Sabo Nanono, and the Minister of Power, Mr. Saleh Mamman. Defending the move and shedding more light on the decision, presidential spokesperson, Femi Adesina submitted on Thursday that the two Ministers fell below expectation, hence their dismissal.

item.title: Menna Fadali - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Movie actress who rose to fame for her roles in Basha telmiz, Gada Ade and El Dealer. Before Fame Her first role came in 2002 after appearing in Ayana Kalby. Trivia Widely popular on social media, her Facebook has amassed more than 1 million followers as well as 5 million Instagram followers. Family Life Her mother was an assistant director. Associated With She worked alongside Karim Abdel Aziz in the film Basha telmiz.

item.title: Cree Cicchino - Age, Family, Bio
Did Rutina Wesley and Her Partner Break Up? Here's What We Know
item.description: ‘Queen Sugar’ star Rutina Wesley got engaged in 2017 to future wife chef Lashonda Cross. Here’s what we know about Rutina and her future wife. Source: TwitterWith the Season 5 return of Queen Sugar, the popular OWN show that follows the lives and relationships of the estranged Bordelon siblings, we’re wondering what happened with the star, Rutina Wesley, and her potential wife. Back in 2017, Rutina came out in a touching Instagram post announcing her engagement to her future wife, chef Lashonda Cross.

item.title: Leicester Coach Disagrees With Wilfred Ndidi Over Injury Status
item.description: Leicester City manager, Enzo Maresca has insisted that Nigerian midfielder, Wilfred Ndidi is not expected to return to competitive football anytime soon. This assertion is contrary to the claims of Wilfred Ndidi who said that he should return to competitive football within the next two weeks. Recall that Ndidi was one of the players Super Eagles head coach, Jose Peseiro planned to take to the 2023 AFCON in Ivory Coast. The defensive midfielder was included in Super Eagles’ 25-man list but the player had to withdraw from the squad due to an injury.

item.title: NEC Warns Against October 20 Protest
item.description: The National Economic Council has warned against October 20 #EndSARS anniversary protest by aggrieved Nigerian citizens. The council has advised those interested in taking part in the protest to look out for other lawful alternatives to express their grievances and suspend the planned anniversary, noting that the protest might again be hijacked by hoodlums. Naija News understands that NEC gave the advisory in a statement released on Friday, October 15. Recounting various actions and inactions already taken by federal and state governments in addressing the gruesome killings of citizens and harassments that led to the 2020 protests, NEC opined that staging another protest might heighten the current security situation in the country.

item.title: Nigerian Governor Discloses Why Fulani Will Always Seek Revenge
item.description: - Governor Nasir El-Rufai is faced with a statement he made back in 2012 - The politician had come under criticisms in the past over the controversial comments - El-Rufai spoke against the attacks on the Fulani people PAY ATTENTION: Join Legit.ng Telegram channel! Never miss important updates! Governor Nasir El-Rufai has said Fulani people will always take revenge whenever they suffer injustice. The politician made the statement on Thursday, May 6, during a webinar organised by the Africa Leadership Group, The Punch reported.

item.title: 11 Netflix Christmas Movies That Are Basically Unwatchable (But I Watched Them Anyway)
item.description: Netlix is serving up plenty of holiday cheese this season, and their Christmas movies may be rougher to watch than Hallmark's. Source: NetflixFor years we’ve grown a love-hate relationship with cheesy (we’re talking mozzarella on cheddar on provolone level cheesy) Hallmark and Lifetime Christmas movies. But once Netflix took over that market with films like A Christmas Prince and Christmas Switch, the instant access of holiday cheese has put us in a dairy overload.

item.title: MMM, Ultimate Cycler and 5 other Ponzi schemes ruling Nigeria
item.description: While the Federal Government, financial institutions and anti-graft agencies have warned Nigerians against investing in the money doubling schemes, millions of Nigerians think this is a new way to survive and make quick cool cash. For now, the two most popular money doubling schemes are Mavrodi Mondial Moneybox popularly called MMM and Ultimate Cycler. Recall that MMM recently froze monies in the scheme for a month while Ultimate Cycler’s website recently crashed and since its return, has not been able to pair participants up.

item.title: ODM kwa Miguna: Tutakutupa ukizidi kumvamia Raila Odinga
item.description: -Viongozi wa ODM wamemtahadharisha Miguna Miguna dhidi ya kumvamia Raila Odinga -Wabunge hao wameahidi kuunga kutimuliwa kwa Miguna mara nyingine iwapo atazidi kumkosea heshima Raila Odinga Chama cha ODM kimemuonya jemedari wa NRM Miguna Miguna dhidi ya kumuingilia kiongozi wao Raila Odinga kufuatia masaibu yake. Wakizungumza Jumamosi , Machi 31, wabunge wa chama hicho walisema kuwa wataamua kumtelekeza Miguna na kuunga mkono kutumuliwa kwake iwapo atazidi kumvamia Raila Odinga. Habari nyingine:Raila alipewa hongo la KSh 25 bilioni na Jubilee - Katibu Mkuu wa Wiper adai

item.title: The Coloring Book Challenge Is a Fun Way to Spot Relationship Differences
item.description: A new and wholesome trend on TikTok involves comparing coloring book designs with someone else to spot the different ways you see the world. Source: TikTok/@envisionariesThe Gist: The coloring book challenge involves coloring pages in and comparing them with the same pages colored in by someone else. The differences between the two designs aren't meant to cause strife or grief in a relationship. They're meant to highlight the ways every person sees the world differently.

item.title: Aamir Khan - Age, Family, Bio
Bob James - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Award-winning jazz artist who pioneered smooth jazz and was often sampled by other artists. Before Fame His first piano-playing job was for a tap-dancing class at age eight, where he was paid 25 cents an hour. Trivia He won a Grammy Award for Best Pop Instrumental Performance of 1981 for One on One with Earl Klugh. He also won for Double Vision, his 1986 collaboration with David Sanborn. Family Life His father hired a music teacher for him when he was just four.

item.title: Mzozo wazuka ndani ya GEMA baada ya Raila kukutana na kikundi kilichodai kuwa chama hicho
item.description: -Mzozo umezuka miongoni mwa wanachama wa GEMA baada ya kikundi cha baadhi ya wanachama wake kukutana na Raila -Kikundi kilichodai kuwa cha maafisa wakuu wa GEMA katika kaunti ya Nairobi kilikikana kile kilichokutana na Raila na kusema kilikuwa ghushi -Walimtaka Raila kufuata taratibu za uongozi anapoendeleza mazungumzo yake Chama cha jamii za Gikuyu, Embu na Meru (GEMA) kimekikana kikundi kilichodai kuwa cha GEMA kilichokutana na kinara wa NASA Raila Odinga siku ya Ijumaa, Mei 11 na kuikashifu kwa kudai kuwa maafisa wa GEMA.

item.title: Policeman Rapes Teenager In Anambra
item.description: A police sergeant has been accused of raping the 13-year-old daughter of a popular pastor at Ukpor in Anambra State. The girl who said the policeman threatened to kill her if she revealed it to anyone is now pregnant after opening up to her mother when she started experiencing ‘’stomach pain.’’ Although the policeman who was said to have raped the girl at gun point, denied being responsible, rather claiming it was a mutual understanding was reported to have accepted to pay the family N20,000 monthly, after the father demanded a sum of N300,000.

item.title: Abby Lee Miller - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Director of Reign Dance Productions and the principal cast member of Lifetime's Dance Moms. She developed a reputation for pushing her students to the edge of their capabilities to prepare them for competitions. Before Fame She was exposed to dance during her earliest years, but was not very interested in performing, so she instead went into teaching and opened her own dance studio at age 14. Trivia Close to three million viewers tuned in to see her train a dozen hopeful dancers to compete for $100,000 and a scholarship to the prestigious Joffrey Ballet School.

item.title: Adunni Ade's biography: ex-boyfriend, family, net worth, filmography
item.description: Adunni Ade is a Nigerian-American actress and producer. She is very influential in Nollywood. The lady has been featured in over 250 English and Yoruba Nigerian films. On top of that, her first film as an executive producer, Soólè (2021), is among the highest-grossing African movies in the box office. It made over N51 million only nine weeks after its release. Aside from her professional achievements, the article unveils exciting things you might not have known about her family.

item.title: Birdman - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Born Bryan Williams, he is best known for being a member of the duo Big Tymers. He also notably pioneered the Cash Money record label. Before Fame He founded Big Tymers in 1998 with DJ Mannie Fresh. Trivia His 2003 album, Like Father Like Son, reached gold certification. In 2011, Forbes estimated that he was worth $110 million. Family Life He married Venezuelan model Diana Levy in September 2012; but they later divorced.

item.title: Karuna Satori - Age, Family, Bio
Why You Should Not Be Offended When Youre Called Prostitute-Nancy Isime Advices Women
item.description: Media personality cum actress, Nancy Isime has urged young women not to take offense when they are called a prostitute. According to Nancy during an interview at the ‘Clout Talk Concert’, as long as a woman isn’t a doctor, a lawyer or an engineer, society would perceive her to be a prostitute as it is the most circulated word. She also added that one doesn’t have to do any thing to be called the word.

item.title: Edwin Clark Rejects Idea Of Naval Base In Kano, Writes Open Letter To Buhari Govt
item.description: Prominent Ijaw leader and elder statesman, Chief Edwin Clark has urged the federal government to have a rethink about its plans to site a Naval base in Kano State. Clark in an open letter to President Muhammadu Buhari viewed the plan as a wrong investment of scarce resources and called on the government to have a rethink. In his argument, the elder statesman said a naval base in a desert seems like ‘mission impossible’ and misplaced priority.

item.title: Fayemi Speaks On Dropping Presidential Ambition For Osinbajo
item.description: A presidential aspirant under the All Progressives Congress and Governor of Ekiti State, Kayode Fayemi has denied dropping his 2023 ambition for Vice President Yemi Osinbajo. The Fayemi campaign organisation stated this while reacting to the claim that he was pressured to drop his presidential ambition during a closed-door meeting with Osinbajo on Thursday. The spokesman of the campaign organisation, Femi Ige in a statement released on Friday described the insinuation as “absolute rubbish”.

item.title: How Many Wives Did Warren Jeffs Have? A New Netflix Doc Examines His Crimes
item.description: How many wives did Warren Jeffs have? What we know about the personal life of the infamous FBI Ten Most Wanted fugitive and 'Keep Sweet' subject. Source: Wikimedia CommonsAs the president of the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, Warren Jeffs engaged in heinous acts that landed him on the FBI's Most Wanted Fugitives list. Ever since 2007, Jeffs has been imprisoned for child sexual assault crimes that he spearheaded while running the church.

item.title: Howard Stern - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Famous New York shock jock, television personality, and author who became known for discussing traditionally obscene subjects in a frank and unabashed way. He created The Howard Stern Show in 1979 and was shortly thereafter joined on the program by Robin Quivers. Before Fame He managed radio commercials in the advertising industry before getting his own gig. Trivia He is the self-proclaimed King of All Media. Although a long-time friend of Donald Trump, he supported Hillary Clinton in the 2016 election.

item.title: Peter Rufai Insists Super Eagles' Goalkeeping Crisis Not Too Bad Yet
item.description: Nigerian legendary goalkeeper, Peter Rufai has insisted that the goalkeeping crisis of the Super Eagles is not in a disastrous state yet. Despite the abysmal state of the goalkeeping department of the Super Eagles, Peter Rufai stressed that Nigeria is blessed with excellent goalkeepers. The Eagles’ first-choice goalkeeper, Francis Uzoho, has struggled to inspire confidence in recent games. The Omonia Nicosia goalkeeper has a history of making mistakes. In October, he conceded cheap goals in the Eagles’ friendlies against Mozambique and Saudi Arabia.

item.title: Natalia Tena - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actress best known for her performance as Nymphadora Tonks in the Harry Potter film franchise. In 2011, she began playing Osha in the popular HBO show Game of Thrones and in 2018 she began playing Lana in YouTube Red's Origin. Before Fame She made her debut in the Academy Award-nominated film About a Boy, which starred Hugh Grant. Trivia She became the lead vocalist and accordion player of Molotov Jukebox. Family Life Her parents are named Maria Tena and Jesus Tena.

item.title: Osimhen May Miss Nigeria Vs South Africa Match
item.description: The star striker for the Super Eagles, Victor Osimhen, would likely be absent for Nigeria’s upcoming semi-final match against South Africa. Naija News reports that the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) match between Nigeria and South Africa is scheduled for Wednesday, February 7, at 6 pm. According to a statement released on Monday by the media officer of the Nigerian team, Babafemi Raji, Osimhen is currently experiencing abdominal discomfort.

item.title: Supreme Court Set To Fix Date For Hearing PDP Suit
item.description: The Supreme Court is set to fix a date for hearing the motion filed by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) demanding the sack of Imo Governor, Hope Uzodinma. Naija News reports that PDP’s lawyer, Phillips Umeadi, had filed additional processes in relation to the motion filed in 2020. The main opposition party is asking the apex court to reverse its decision that removed Emeka Ihedioha as Governor months after he won the March 9, 2019 election.

item.title: Who Is Monica Garcia From RHOSLC Dating?
item.description: Monica Garcia Met Her “Incredible” and Mysterious Baby Daddy While Filming ‘RHOSLC’ Monica and her boyfriend are expecting the ‘RHOSLC’ alum’s fifth child. By Elizabeth RandolphApr. 11 2024, Published 12:02 p.m. ET Source: BravoWhen fans last saw Monica Garcia on Bravo, she defended her actions on The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City. In the Season 4 finale, Heather Gay exposed Monica as one of the creators behind Reality Von Tease, a gossip account about the RHOSLC cast.

item.title: Wizkids Bodyguard Cries Out Over Alleged Phone Theft At Popular Lagos Club
item.description: Roy Emmanuel, a bodyguard to Nigerian award-winning singer, Wizkid has cried out after his phone was allegedly stolen at the popular Quilox Club in Victoria Island, Lagos. Naija News reports that Roy revealed the latest development on his Instagram page stating that he left his phone on top of a car at the Quilox car park on Friday, and a lady picked it up. He released CCTV footage showing a lady removing a phone from the top of a car and pleaded with the public for information about her.

item.title: Real Madrid Faults UEFA Refund Plan
item.description: Real Madrid want all fans who attended the UEFA Champions League final in Paris in May 2022 to be compensated by the European football governing body. Real Madrid stressed that UEFA’s decision to just reimburse chosen people who attended the Champions League final is “insufficient”. Naija News had reported that an independent investigation concluded that UEFA is “primarily at fault” for the unruly conditions that “almost led in calamity” outside the Stade de France in Paris ahead of the Champions League final on May 28.

item.title: The Newest Used Car Salesman At This Dealership Is A Very Good Boy
item.description: Dog Opens Up A Used Car Dealership And Is Now A Very Serious BusinessmanBy Zachary BrennerUpdated Nov. 18 2019, 2:22 p.m. ET One of the cool things about being a dog is that you never need to worry about work. You get to lay about all day and have people bring you food. The only currency exchanged is unbridled affection for your owner and maybe occasionally being used as a cry pillow and therapist when he or she has had an especially bad day.

item.title: Trump did not shun Buhari nor invite Jonathan as Nigeria's representative at his inauguration
item.description: Deji Adeyanju, a Twitter user who boasts of close ties to the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) had claimed that United States of America president-elect Donald Trump has invited ex-president of Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan to his inauguration on Friday, January 20, 2017. The claim has now been found to be a lie. In a singular tweet, Adeyanju had also claimed that no invitation was extended by Trump to incumbent President Muhammadu Buhari.

item.title: Amanda Knox - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American student who was accused, despite a lack of hard evidence, of murdering her roommate, Meredith Kercher, while studying abroad in Perugia, Italy in 2007. She spent four years in an Italian prison, then after a series of court trials, she was acquitted of the charges in 2015. Before Fame She graduated from Seattle Preparatory High School in 2005. She subsequently attended the University of Washington and made the fateful decision to study abroad for a year in Italy.

item.title: Oduah may become coordinator of pro-Jonathans groups during 2015 campaign.
item.description: There are strong indications that a former Minister of Aviation, Stella Oduah, would become the coordinator of pro-Jonathan’s groups, once President’s ambition for 2015 re-election campaign would be officially announced. According to Vanguard, the presidency is currently creating a unit called Research and Strategy Unit, for which she would eventually become the Director General.  The unit would later become the spearhead the President’s 2015 campaign. The new assignment may be similar to what she did prior to 2011 Presidential election, when Princess Stella Oduah handled a major campaign and enlightenment platform, the Neighbour to Neighbour project, which was very vibrant and made great impact.

item.title: Buhari Restates Vows to #ENDSARS 5 for 5 demands
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has said restated his commitment to implementing the five demands made by youths during the #ENDSARS protests that swept across the country in October. President Buhari made the promise in his New Year message, stressing the fact that “Our young people are our most valuable natural resource, at home and abroad.” He made the pledge on the solemn reality that he is the elected President and Commander-in-Chief of the country, calling the youths the most valuable resources.

item.title: Dad Doesn't Let Daughter Skip School to Grieve Mom's Death
item.description: "Did I Make a Huge Mistake?": Dad Won't Let Daughter Take Time off School to Grieve Mom's DeathBy Allison DeGrushePublished June 27 2023, 6:49 p.m. ET Source: Getty Images / Reddit / u/Competitive_Chef_188When a loved one passes away, a family usually comes together and supports one another. However, that doesn't seem to be the case for this man and his teenage daughter in the wildly popular "AITA" subreddit. In June 2023, a man took to the popular subreddit to explain a recent decision he made regarding his teenage daughter.

item.title: Is Jamie Lynn Spears Expecting Again?
item.description: Years after leaving 'Zoey 101' to be a teen mom, there are rumors Jamie Lynn Spears is pregnant again with her husband, Jamie Watson. Source: InstagramIt's been more than a decade since the hit Nickelodeon TV show Zoey 101 aired its final episode, but the cast and crew have recently been getting back together, teasing of something bigger coming fans' way. Viewers of the show will remember it was pulled from programming around the time that the show's lead, Jamie Lynn Spears, revealed she was pregnant at only 16.

item.title: Eko, Ikeja Discos Explain Power Outages In Lagos
item.description: Eko Electricity Distribution Company (EKEDC) and Ikeja Electric (IE) Plc on Saturday explained the reasons behind the outage currently being experienced by customers under their networks in Lagos State. Naija News reports that the Discos gave the reasons in statements issued on their social media pages on Saturday. According to the companies, the power outages are caused by a drop in power generation. In its statement, EKEDC stated that the outages were due to the drop in power generation from an average of 3,700MW to 2,000MW per hour.

item.description: - The 32 individuals were arrested from a Mandera-bound bus from Nairobi and ordered to quarantine at Elwak for 14 days - County executive Ahmed Sheikh confirmed the development in a complaint letter addressed to Mandera south deputy county commissioner - The county attributed the disappearance to laxity and lack of cooperation on the part of the administrator Efforts to contain spread of coronavirus in Mandera county have received a major setback after 32 people broke out from a quarantine facility.

Giving her reason for sharing the documented clip, Ashmusy said, she wanted to showcase what many girls who go through plastic surgery endure during the process.

item.title: Ye, fka Kanye West, Wants to Start a "Yecosystem"
item.description: Ye, fka Kanye West, Has a New Goal: Universe-BuildingBy Chris BarillaPublished Oct. 25 2022, 1:39 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIt seems as though Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, may have finally gotten what he wanted. The artist, who has expressed displeasure regarding his major deals with the likes of Adidas and Gap for months, has officially been dropped by both brands in the wake of anti-semitic comments that he made on social media.

item.title: Borrowing For Recurrent Expenditure Foolish
item.description: Former President Olusegun Obasanjo has condemned President Muhammadu Buhari-led government over the level of loans the administration has taken. Obasanjo in a statement on Sunday said borrowing for recurrent expenditure is foolish. The elder statesman in an interview with Channels TV on Facebook said borrowing and accumulating debt for the next generations to come is criminal. He said, “If you want to build a commercial house and you go and borrow money, and you have 50 per cent of your own money and you borrow 50 per cent and in five years, you pay the 50 per cent that you borrowed.

item.title: Chrissy Teigen Said She's Having Her Breast Implants Removed: "I'm Just Over It"

Chrissy’s explanation came after she shared a video of herself taking a test for COVID-19, which led fans to wonder whether she was sick or worried about having the virus.

item.title: SERAP To Sue Nigerian Senate Over 'Unlawful' Suspension Of Senator Ningi
item.description: The Socio-Economic Right And Accountability Project (SERAP) has announced that it will sue the Nigerian Senate for what it termed the unlawful suspension of Senator Abdul Ningi. The right group, which described the embattled senator as a whistleblower, announced its decision in a post on its official X account shortly after the Senate announced Ningi’s suspension. The group emphasized that budget padding was a crime against Nigerians. “We’re suing the Senate over the unlawful suspension of whistleblower and Senator Abdul Ningi for 3 months over his allegation that the Senate inserted projects worth N3 trillion in the 2024 budget, contrary to the Nigerian Constitution and international standards,” the group in a post on its official X account said.

item.title: APC Governors 'Fight' During Abuja Meeting
item.description: The contentious issue bordering around the use of direct primaries by political parties in the country recently caused a heated disagreement between governors of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC). Naija News understands while some of the Governors are in full support of the recommendation by the National Assembly for parties in the country to adopt direct primaries in choosing their candidates, others feel it is undemocratic to insist on a particular method and parties should be given the freedom and flexibility to adopt whichever style suits them.

item.title: Dangote, Obasanjo, Congo President Meet
item.description: Former President, Olusegun Obasanjo and African richest man and business mogul, Aliko Dangote, have met with the President of the  Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), Félix Tshisekedi. The trio met with the prospect of going into mining and agricultural sectors. Speaking via a statement by his Special Assistant on Media, Kehinde Akinyemi, on Friday, Obasanjo announced that he is in DRC with Dangote to see how the country could benefit from one of Africa’s biggest investors, Aliko Dangote.

item.title: Former Presidential Candidate, Sowore Arrested In Abuja
item.description: The presidential candidate of African Action Congress in the 2019 election, Omoyele Sowore has been allegedly arrested by police in Abuja. The National Publicity Secretary of the party, Femi Adeyeye, in a statement released on Thursday disclosed that Sowore was arrested after stepping out of the court where the chairman and members of the party had converged to witness the case of the party against the Independent National Electoral Commission and usurpers.

item.title: Ex-DSS Director Reveals Reason For Recent Reduction In Banditry
item.description: A former Director of the Department of State Services (DSS),  Mike Ejiofor, has revealed the reason for the recent reduction in cases of banditry across the country. Speaking during an interview on Channels Television‘s programme ‘Sunrise Daily’ on Monday, Ejiofor said the reduction in the activities of bandits could be traced to Ramadan currently being observed by Muslims across the country. Ejiofor said most of the bandits are religious people who are also observing Ramadan, which is the ninth month of the Islamic calendar.

item.title: The Plot of 'Lovecraft Country' on HBO Is Seriously Bone-Chilling
item.description: Jordan Peele's New HBO Series 'Lovecraft Country' Is About to Be Your New Favorite ThrillerBy Lizzy RosenbergUpdated May 7 2020, 1:05 p.m. ET Source: YouTubeOver the last few years, Jordan Peele has gained tremendous notoriety in the horror genre, from Get Out to Us, and even the upcoming Antebellum. But his latest production, Lovecraft Country, looks seriously bone-chilling. The new HBO series, which was written by Underground writer, Misha Green, combines historical fiction with horror-fantasy, making for an extra spooky thrill.

item.title: Internet Thinks Woman Should Divorce Husband Because He Didn't Notice She Cleaned the Bathroom
item.description: One woman vigorously cleaned her dirty bathroom, but much to her chagrin, her husband didn't notice and the internet thinks it's a sign. Source: TikTok/@mercy_festusRemember the man who didn't notice his wife chopped hair her off to the “shortest it has ever been?” Well, we found a friend for him. Another man doesn't seem to have any vision problems, but he can't seem to notice blatantly obvious things right in front of him.

item.title: Nnamdi Kanu Made Reckless Statements, Let The Law Prevail
item.description: Former Director, the Department of State Services (DSS), Mike Ejiofor, has expressed shock over the rearrest and extradition of the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu. Speaking to Channels Television, Ejiofor stated that the law should prevail on the matter of the pro-Biafra activist. The former DSS boss stated that though he had nothing against the IPOB leader, he should have come back to Nigeria to led agitations for the Biafra Republic.

item.title: Tinubu Has Re-introduced Petrol Subsidy Through Back Door Phrank Shaibu
item.description: Phrank Shaibu, Special Assistant on Public Communication to the former Vice-President, Atiku Abubakar, has asserted that the administration of President Bola Tinubu has re-introduced petrol subsidy through the back door. Naija News reported that Tinubu was said to havesilently re-introduced the payment of fuel subsidies in Nigeria in order to keep the price of petrol stable. The International Monetary Fund (IMF) made the allegation in a statement last week and urged Tinubu’s government to stop the payment of subsidies on petrol completely to free up funds to run the government.

item.title: Unknwown Gunmen Kill Three Policemen In Ebonyi
item.description: Unknown gunmen have killed three police officers in front of a police station along the Enugu-Abakaliki highway in Ebonyi State. It was learned that the policemen were killed by the gunmen during an attack on a roadblock mounted in front of the station on Monday. According to reports, the policemen stopped a hummer bus conveying the gunmen, and in turn, opened fire on the officers. The remains of the three police victims have been deposited at a mortuary in Abakaliki, the state capital.

item.title: Why Did Martin Luther King, Sr. Change His Name?
item.description: Martin Luther King, Jr. Was Almost Named Michael but His Father Changed Their NamesBy Joseph AllenJan. 16 2024, Published 1:09 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesMartin Luther King, Jr. has one of the most memorable names in American history, but his father almost named him something completely different. When he was born in 1929, the name on his birth certificate was Michael King, and he was named after his father, who had the same name.

item.title: Buhari Needs Help And I Am Ready To Help Him
item.description: Former Vice President of Nigeria, Alhaji Atiku Abubakar has declared that it is time for those who truly believe in the country to help the administration of President Muhammadu Buhari. Atiku noted that it has become obvious that the current administration lacks the capacity to help the nation and the citizens but anyone who has the interest of Nigerians at heart must rise up and help in whichever way they can.

Filters have even upgraded to the point of being able to put a hilarious filter on your dog or cat. Fans of the Snapchat bald filter have been inquiring how to do the same effect on TikTok.

item.title: Importance of election in democracy
item.description: The elections are the most important time for both citizens in a country and the politicians. A free and fair election guarantee the trust of the citizens in the elected government. As we all know, democracy is defined as a government of the people, for the people, and by the people. So how can elections impact the democratic process. Do elections denote true democracy? Keep reading to learn more about the importance of election in democracy.

item.title: Sonko: Sina shida na Rais Uhuru Kenyatta
item.description: Gavana wa Nairobi Mike Sonko amesema matatizo ambayo anapitia kwa sasa hayajaletwa na tofauti kati yake na Rais Uhuru Kenyatta au serikali yake. Sonko alisema hana shida yoyote na Rais Kenyatta wala afisa yeyote wa serikali yake huku akifichua kuwa tayari alitatua tofauti kati yake na katibu wa wizara ya Usalama wa Ndani Karanja Kibicho. Habari Nyingine: Polisi wanasa ng'ombe aliyekuwa akisafirishwa kwenye gari aina ya 'saloon' Akiongea kwenye mahojiano na runinga ya KTN Jumatano Oktoba 23, Sonko alisema yuko tayari kusafisha jina lake kutoka kwenye masaibu yanayomwandama.

item.title: What's 'Snowfall' Actor Damson Idris's Net Worth? Details
item.description: What is actor Damson Idris's net worth? From his net worth to his rumored girlfriend, here's everything we know about the 'Snowfall' star! Teasers for the sixth and final season of FX’s Snowfall have arrived and I’m not crying, you are. The final chapter of the critically-acclaimed crime drama is bittersweet. While we’ll finally find out how the story ends, we’ll also be forced to say goodbye to our favorite cast members — one of whom is Franklin Saint actor Damson Idris.

item.title: Afenifere Slams Buhari Over Clamp Down On Agitators
item.description: The pan Yoruba socio-political organisation, Afenifere, has condemned President Muhammadu Buhari over the clampdown on agitators in the country. The acting Leader of Afenifere, Ayo Adebanjo, said this in a statement issued by the National Publicity Secretary of the group, Jare Ajayi, on Monday. According to the group, President Muhammadu Buhari should focus on ending insecurity in the country instead of going after secessionists. The group also appreciated the Olubadan of Ibadan, Oba Saliu Adetunji and the Ooni of Ife Oba Adeyeye Ogunwusi, for their efforts to ensure that Yoruba Nation activist, Sunday Adeyemo aka Sunday Igboho, was not left alone in his trying moment.

item.title: Hatimaye! Wanawake wa Saudia wanaweza kuendesha magari
item.description: -Saudi Arabia inabatilisha sheria ambayo huwazuia wanawake nchini humo kuendesha magari -Wanawake wanaopatikana wakiendesha magari nchini humo huadhibiwa vikali sana kwa kukiuka sheria Raia wa Saudi Arabia walisherekea baada ya serikali kutangaza kuwa atabatilisha sheria inayowazuia wanawake kuendesha magari. Wanawake nchini humo huadhibiwa ivikali kwa kupatikana kuendesha magari. Tangazo hilo lilitolewa wakati wa mkutano wa wanahabari Washington, Marekani. Habari Nyingine: Wazee Nyeri wakasirishwa baada ya ‘Mugumo’ uliopandwa na Uhuru kuharibiwa Itakuwa mara ya kwanza kwa wanawake wa Saudi Arabia kuruhusiwa kuendesha magari, “Wanawake watakuwa wakipewa leseni ya kuendesha magari kama wanaume,” lilisema shirika la habari la Saudi Arabia.
